product_details.name: MAXIMOR Good Man Eau de Parfum - Sophisticated Elegance in Blue
product_details.description:
• Premium eau de parfum concentration for longer-lasting fragrance
• Generous 100ml/3.3 FL.OZ size for extended use
• Luxurious frosted blue glass bottle with modern design
• Elegant black cap with sophisticated finishing
• Distinctive MAXIMOR branding with geometric logo
• Perfect for daily wear or special occasions
• Contemporary masculine fragrance
• Professional-grade perfume packaging
• Ideal gift choice for sophisticated men
• Sleek and minimalist bottle design that stands out on any shelf

banner_details:
This banner presents a premium fragrance advertisement with a clean and elegant design. The background is composed of layered curved shapes and circles in varying shades of blue, giving it depth and a luxurious aesthetic. At the center is a vertically aligned product image (`product_image`) of the perfume bottle, drawing immediate attention. Above the image are three text elements: a bold, stylized brand name (`heading`), a highlighted product title (`subheading`), and a smaller tagline (`tagline`) emphasizing sophistication. Below the product, the price (`price`) is displayed in a large, eye-catching font, followed by a contrasting call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) labeled with a compelling prompt. Minimalist square grid graphics on the top-left and bottom-right add a touch of modern tech-inspired detailing.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: `#1C3B6A`
- Steel Blue: `#2A4F8F`
- Midnight Blue: `#0A244F`
- Sky Blue: `#BBDEFB`
- Bright Blue (CTA): `#4A90E2`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek, elegant gradient primarily in shades of cool blue, giving it a refined and masculine feel. The bottle transitions from a deep navy at the base (#1F2C4A) to a softer periwinkle blue toward the top (#5D7CA6), with a frosted matte texture that blends these hues smoothly. The cap is a solid matte black (#1A1A1A), grounding the design with a bold, modern contrast. White text (#FFFFFF) stands out crisply against the blue background, ensuring clear visibility. Use this palette to evoke sophistication and freshness in an advertisement banner, emphasizing calm confidence and luxury.
